title: A Short Open Letter to Faker
body:
Right now, you're probably blaming yourself. You've just lost your first World Championship ever, and your dynasty has finally been toppled. Your perfect track record, broken. And you're right to be dissapointed, you're right to be sad. But the one thing you shouldn't do is blame yourself. 

You are still the best League of Legends player who ever lived. Even now, your status is utterly undisputed. You played your heart out this entire championship. You carried your team on your back all the way up to the finals. You're a living legend, the Unkillable Demon King, the God of League of Legends. You are the model that every player aspires to be, and no matter what, your name will go down in history. Don't be ashamed. Be proud.

I'm sure he considers himself lucky enough to be able to year in year out be in this position.  I don't think Faker is Piglet, is the jist of what I'm saying.
